schema:
PREFIX hl7: <http://hl7.org/fhir/>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>

start = @<ObservationShape>

<ObservationShape> {               # An Observation has:
  hl7:status ["preliminary" "final"]; #   status in this value set
  hl7:subject @<PatientShape>         #   a subject matching <PatientShape>.
}

<PatientShape> {                   # A Patient has:
 hl7:name xsd:string*;                #   one or more names
 hl7:birthdate xsd:date?              #   and an optional birthdate.
}
data:
PREFIX hl7: <http://hl7.org/fhir/>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>

<Obs1>
  hl7:status    "final" ;
  hl7:subject   <Patient2> .

<Patient2>
  hl7:name "Bob" ;
  hl7:birthdate "1999-12-31"^^xsd:date .

  hl7:birthdate "1999-12-31T01:23:45"^^xsd:dateTime .
